alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 7:34PM CDT until May 01 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Texline, or 13 miles east of Clayton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Boise City, Texline, Wheeless and Felt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
